name: Skyboy Minis: Spacetimewar!
description:
Spacetimewar! is also available on Kongregate. Check it out!

http://www.kongregate.com/games/SkyboyGames/spacet...

Now you can play SpacetimeWar! on Newgrounds. Yay!

http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/689409

Spacetimewar! is a frantic space shooter where you have 30 seconds to keep a fleet of enemy fighters from destroying your warp core. The name and look of the game were inspired by Spacewar!, the 1962 game considered by many to be the first video game.

Created for #1GAM (OneGameAMonth) and inspired by the September keyword: "Thirty Seconds"
